title: Lumber Yard Restaurant
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A modern day bistro set in the heart of the Dickinson historical district has a separate vegetarian menu with vegan items and ones that can be made vegan. Using local produce, menu features an array of contemporary American cuisine. Dining room seats 48 in an elegant space for casual gatherings. Can accommodate quiet tables for two as well as groups. Guests can also be seated for a meal or a quick bite at the bar.
